subject: RE: [junit]Testing XML data
msgSnippet: Hi Antonie, Just convert the expected xml in a string format and compare it with actual xml in string format. This comparision can be done using assertEquals()
messageBody:
Hi Antonie,

Just convert the expected xml in a string format and compare it with actual xml in string format. This comparision can be done using assertEquals() method.

Regards
Pragnesh

-----Original Message-----
From: VOIRY,ANTOINE (HP-France,ex2) [mailto:antoine_voiry@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 14, 2002 1:05 PM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [junit]Testing XML data


Hi all,
I actually developped a web service application and would like to be able
to compare the xml received with an expected result. Is anyone know, if a
framework can do that.

Bye
Antoine
